text:
I have structure like this (IIS with tomcat connectors in the front)

* tomcat1 - app A
* tomcat2 - app B
* tomcat3 - app C
* tomcat4 - app C
* tomcat5 - app C
* tomcat6 - app C

Now I restart e.g. tomcat4 (actually it's JBoss 5.1 with Tomcat so it takes some time to boot) the whole IIS goes down - all apps and I see page from IIS - http error 503. It takes a lot of time to recover, restarts of IIS, restarting pool and website. Event log is empty, jk logs as well.
Bugzilla is not a support forum. Please take this to the Tomcat users mailing list.
creator: markt@apache.org
